scripts.build-all: npm run -s build-app & npm run -s build-pwmgr
scripts.build-app: rimraf dist-app & parcel build src/index.html --no-minify --out-dir dist-app/
scripts.build-pwmgr: rimraf dist-pwmgr & parcel build src/pwmgr.html --no-minify --out-dir dist-pwmgr/ --out-file index.html
scripts.upload-pwmgr: gsutil -m -h Cache-Control:"Cache-Control:private, max-age=0, no-transform" cp dist-pwmgr/* gs://pwmgr.app/
scripts.upload-app: gsutil -m -h Cache-Control:"Cache-Control:private, max-age=0, no-transform" cp dist-app/* gs://dicekeys.app/
scripts.update-app: npm run -s build-app & npm run -s upload-app
scripts.update-pwmgr: npm run -s build-pwmgr & npm run -s upload-pwmgr
scripts.upload-all: npm run upload-pwmgr && npm run upload-app
